comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic accompanied an article on Wragge's observatory at Mt Kosciuszko which photographer Charles Kerry wrote for the Sydney Mail in December 1897...the pics appeared on p. 1363 (I can't work out how to link to the pics!). The SM caption had 'Packhorses with Supplies' - news.google.com/newspapers?id=FvlPAAAAIBAJ&sjid=JZUDA... Also see www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3369189167/
